AssociateService.name: AssociateService
AssociateService.documentation: Adds a specific service association to an AgentSpace. It overwrites the existing association of the same service. Returns 201 Created on success.

CreateAgentSpace.name: CreateAgentSpace
CreateAgentSpace.documentation: Creates a new AgentSpace with the specified name and description. Duplicate space names are allowed.

CreateOneTimeLoginSession.name: CreateOneTimeLoginSession
CreateOneTimeLoginSession.documentation: Generate secure one-time session for initiating off-console Application login

DeleteAgentSpace.name: DeleteAgentSpace
DeleteAgentSpace.documentation: Deletes an AgentSpace. This operation is idempotent and returns a 204 No Content response on success.

DisableOperatorApp.name: DisableOperatorApp
DisableOperatorApp.documentation: Disable the Operator App for the specified AgentSpace

DisassociateService.name: DisassociateService
DisassociateService.documentation: Deletes a specific service association from an AgentSpace. This operation is idempotent and returns a 204 No Content response on success.

EnableOperatorApp.name: EnableOperatorApp
EnableOperatorApp.documentation: Enable the Operator App to access the given AgentSpace

GetAgentSpace.name: GetAgentSpace
GetAgentSpace.documentation: Retrieves detailed information about a specific AgentSpace.

GetAssociation.name: GetAssociation
GetAssociation.documentation: Retrieves given associations configured for a specific AgentSpace.

GetOperatorAppTeams.name: GetOperatorAppTeams
GetOperatorAppTeams.documentation: Get the full auth configuration of operator including any enabled auth flow

GetService.name: GetService
GetService.documentation: Retrieves given service by it's unique identifier

HandleServiceRegistrationCallback.name: HandleServiceRegistrationCallback
HandleServiceRegistrationCallback.documentation: Handle OAuth callback from external service. No authentication required as this is called by the external service

InitiateServiceRegistration.name: InitiateServiceRegistration
InitiateServiceRegistration.documentation: Initiate OAuth registration flow for a service. Requires IAM authentication to identify caller's AWS account

ListServices.name: ListServices
ListServices.documentation: List a list of registered service on the account level.

SearchServiceAccessibleResource.name: SearchServiceAccessibleResource
SearchServiceAccessibleResource.documentation: Look up a registered service accessible resources

UpdateAgentSpace.name: UpdateAgentSpace
UpdateAgentSpace.documentation: Updates the information of an existing AgentSpace.

UpdateAssociation.name: UpdateAssociation
UpdateAssociation.documentation: Updates the configuration of an existing service association for an AgentSpace. Returns 200 OK on success.

UpdateOperatorAppTeams.name: UpdateOperatorAppTeams
UpdateOperatorAppTeams.documentation: Update the list of teams that the Operator App is enabled for.

assumableRoleArn.documentation: Role ARN to be assumed by AIDevOps to operate on behalf of customer.

accountId.documentation: AWS Account Id corresponding to provided resources.

AWSConfiguration.documentation: Configuration for AWS monitor account integration, allowing AIDevOps to monitor AWS resources.

resourceArn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource

AWSResource.documentation: Represents an AWS resource with its type, ARN, and optional metadata.

AWSResourceType.documentation: Supported AWS resource types for monitoring and integration.

AWSTagList.documentation: List of AWS tags as key-value pairs.

message.documentation: Detailed error message describing why access was denied.

AccessDeniedException.documentation: Access to the requested resource is denied due to insufficient permissions.

pageSize.documentation: The number of results to fetch per page.

page.documentation: The page number of the results to fetch.

hasNextPage.documentation: Whether there is a next page of results

cursor.documentation: The cursor indicating page of results to fetch

AdditionalServiceRegistrationStep.documentation: Additional steps required to complete service registration.

createdAt.documentation: The timestamp when the resource was created.

updatedAt.documentation: The timestamp when the resource was last updated.

encryptionKeyId.documentation: AWS-managed key for server-side encryption. If omitted, an AWS owned key will be used.

AgentSpace.documentation: Represents a complete AgentSpace with all its properties, timestamps, encryption settings, and unique identifier.

configuration.documentation: The configuration that directs how AgentSpace interacts with the given service.

AssociateServiceInput.documentation: Input for creating a new service association within an AgentSpace.

AssociateServiceOutput.documentation: Output containing the newly created association and optional webhook configuration.

createdAt.documentation: The timestamp when the resource was created.

updatedAt.documentation: The timestamp when the resource was last updated.

invalid.documentation: The invalidation status of the given association.

invalidDate.documentation: The invalidation datetime of the given association.

associationId.documentation: The unique identifier of the given association.

configuration.documentation: The configuration that directs how AgentSpace interacts with the given service.

Association.documentation: Represents a service association within an AgentSpace, defining how the agent interacts with external services.

AssociationId.documentation: Unique identifier for a service association within an AgentSpace

CfnStackArns.documentation: List of CloudFormation stack ARNs associated with a pipeline.

ConflictException.documentation: The request conflicts with the current state of the resource.

encryptionKeyId.documentation: AWS-managed key for server-side encryption. If omitted, an AWS owned key will be used.

clientToken.documentation: Client-provided token to ensure request idempotency. When the same token is provided in subsequent calls, the same response is returned within a 8-hour window.

authFlow.documentation: The authentication flow configured for the operator App. 'iam' is the only supported value

CreateOneTimeLoginSessionInput.documentation: Input for creating a one-time login session for the Operator App.

sessionToken.documentation: Signed JWT for initiating login with off-console Application.

sessionUrl.documentation: API endpoint to initiate login with off-console Application.

CreateOneTimeLoginSessionOutput.documentation: Output containing the session token and URL for one-time login.

DatadogAuthorizationConfig.documentation: Authorization configuration for Datadog MCP server (uses authorization discovery only).

authorizationConfig.documentation: Datadog MCP server authorization configuration (only authorization discovery is supported).

DatadogServiceDetails.documentation: Complete service details for Datadog MCP server integration.

serviceId.documentation: The service id to deregister. A service can only be deregistered if it is not associated with any AgentSpace.

authFlow.documentation: The authentication flow configured for the operator App.

DisableOperatorAppInput.documentation: Input for disabling the Operator App for an AgentSpace.

associationId.documentation: The unique identifier of the given association.

DisassociateServiceInput.documentation: Input for removing a service association from an AgentSpace.

DocumentList.documentation: Generic list of document objects for flexible data structures.

clientName.documentation: User friendly OAuth client name specified by end user.

clientId.documentation: OAuth client ID for authenticating with the service.

exchangeParameters.documentation: OAuth token exchange parameters for authenticating with the service.

clientSecret.documentation: OAuth client secret for authenticating with the service.

authorizationConfig.documentation: Dynatrace OAuth client credentials configuration. Use this when registering with OAuth client credentials flow.

operatorAppRoleArn.documentation: The IAM role end users assume to access AIDevOps APIs

idcInstanceArn.documentation: The IdC instance Arn used to create an IdC auth application

updatedAt.documentation: The timestamp when the Operator App was updated.

teams.documentation: The list of teams that the Operator App is enabled for.

idc.documentation: Configuration authorizing the OperatorApp with AWS Identity Center (IdC)

apiKey.documentation: API Key for API Key webhook authentication

associationId.documentation: The unique identifier of the given association.

message.documentation: Detailed error message describing the internal error.

InternalServerException.documentation: An internal server error occurred. Please try again later.

message.documentation: Detailed error message describing which parameter is invalid and why.

InvalidParameterException.documentation: One or more parameters provided in the request are invalid.

key.documentation: The key of the key-value pair. Supports Unicode letters, numbers, spaces, and common symbols.

value.documentation: The value of the key-value pair. Supports Unicode letters, numbers, spaces, and common symbols.

KeyValuePair.documentation: Generic key-value pair structure for tags and metadata.

LinkedAssociations.documentation: Set of linked association IDs for parent-child relationships

maxResults.documentation: Maximum number of results to return in a single call.

nextToken.documentation: Token for the next page of results.

apiKeyName.documentation: User friendly API key name specified by end user.

apiKeyValue.documentation: API key value for authenticating with the service.

returnToEndpoint.documentation: The endpoint to return to after OAuth flow completes (must be AWS console domain)

tokenName.documentation: User friendly bearer token name specified by end user.

tokenValue.documentation: Bearer token value in alphanumeric for authenticating with the service.

authorizationHeader.documentation: HTTP header name to send the bearer token in requests to the service. Defaults to 'Authorization' per RFC 6750.

tools.documentation: List of MCP tools can be used with the association.

MCPServerConfiguration.documentation: Configuration for Model Context Protocol (MCP) server integration.

MCPServerDatadogConfiguration.documentation: Configuration for Model Context Protocol (MCP) server integration.

MCPServerDetails.documentation: Complete service details for MCP server integration.

clientName.documentation: User friendly OAuth client name specified by end user.

exchangeParameters.documentation: OAuth token exchange parameters for authenticating with the service.

returnToEndpoint.documentation: The endpoint to return to after OAuth flow completes (must be AWS console domain)

clientSecret.documentation: OAuth client secret for authenticating with the service. Required for confidential clients or when PKCE is not supported. Optional for public clients using PKCE.

supportCodeChallenge.documentation: Whether the service supports PKCE (Proof Key for Code Exchange) for enhanced security during the OAuth flow.

scopes.documentation: OAuth scopes for 3LO authentication. The service will always request scope offline_access.

NewRelicAlertPolicyIds.documentation: List of New Relic alert policy IDs

applicationIds.documentation: List of monitored APM application IDs in New Relic

entityGuids.documentation: List of globally unique IDs for New Relic resources (apps, hosts, services)

alertPolicyIds.documentation: List of alert policy IDs grouping related conditions

apiKey.documentation: New Relic API Key authentication (apiKey, accountId, region).

NextToken.documentation: Pagination token for retrieving next page of results.

authorizationUrl.documentation: The URL to redirect the user to for OAuth authorization.

serviceId.documentation: Service ID - present when registration is complete, absent when additional steps are required

additionalStep.documentation: Indicates if additional steps are required to complete service registration (e.g., 3-legged OAuth)

groupId.documentation: Optional GitLab group ID for group-level access tokens

RegisteredGitLabServiceDetails.documentation: Details specific to a registered GitLab instance.

RegisteredGithubServiceDetails.documentation: Details specific to a registered GitHub service.

authorizationMethod.documentation: The MCP server uses this authorization method.

apiKeyHeader.documentation: If the MCP server uses API key authentication, these details are provided.

RegisteredMCPServerDetails.documentation: Details specific to a registered MCP (Model Context Protocol) server.

RegisteredNewRelicDetails.documentation: Details specific to a registered NewRelic instance.

serviceType.documentation: The service type e.g github or dynatrace

accessibleResources.documentation: List of accessible resources for this service.

additionalServiceDetails.documentation: Additional details specific to the service type.

RegisteredService.documentation: Represents a registered service with its configuration and accessible resources.

RegisteredServiceNowDetails.documentation: Details specific to a registered ServiceNow instance.

RegisteredSlackServiceDetails.documentation: Details specific to a registered Slack workspace.

message.documentation: Detailed error message describing which resource was not found.

ResourceNotFoundException.documentation: The requested resource could not be found.

serviceId.documentation: The service id to list accessible resources.

options.documentation: The service options to lookup accessible resources.

accessibleResources.documentation: List of accessible resources for this service.

Service.documentation: Enumeration of all supported service types, combining OAuth 3-legged, client credentials, and simple token authentication methods.

sourceAws.documentation: AWS source account configuration for monitoring resources.

ServiceConfiguration.documentation: Union of all supported service configuration types. Each service has its own specific configuration structure.

ServiceDetails.documentation: Union of service-specific configuration details for service registration.

instanceUrl.deprecatedMessage: To be removed once the migration in core package is complete

clientName.documentation: User friendly OAuth client name specified by end user.

exchangeParameters.documentation: OAuth token exchange parameters for authenticating with the service.

clientSecret.documentation: OAuth client secret for authenticating with the service.

authorizationConfig.documentation: ServiceNow OAuth client credentials configuration. Use this when registering with OAuth client credentials flow.

message.documentation: Detailed error message describing which quota was exceeded.

ServiceQuotaExceededException.documentation: The request would exceed the service quota limit.

SlackChannel.documentation: Represents a Slack channel with its ID and optional name.

SlackTransmissionTarget.documentation: Defines Slack channels for different types of agent notifications.

accountId.documentation: AWS Account Id corresponding to provided resources.

assumableRoleArn.documentation: Role ARN to be assumed by AIDevOps to operate on behalf of customer.

externalId.documentation: External ID for additional security when assuming the role. Used to prevent the confused deputy problem.

resources.documentation: List of AWS resource to be associated to agentspace

SourceAwsConfiguration.documentation: Configuration for AWS source account integration. Note: passRole check on 'assumableRoleArn' is not supported.

TeamList.documentation: A list of Team IDs, limited to 10 teams maximum.

message.documentation: Detailed error message describing the throttling condition.

ThrottlingException.documentation: The request was throttled due to too many requests. Please slow down and try again.

configuration.documentation: The updated configuration that directs how AgentSpace interacts with the given service.

UpdateAssociationOutput.documentation: Output containing the updated association and optional webhook configuration.

teams.documentation: The list of teams that the Operator App is enabled for.

createdAt.documentation: The timestamp when the Operator App was enabled.

updatedAt.documentation: The timestamp when the Operator App was updated.

teams.documentation: The list of teams that the Operator App is enabled for.

authFlow.documentation: The authentication flow configured for the operator App.

operatorAppRoleArn.documentation: The IAM role end users assume to access AIDevOps APIs

iam.documentation: Configuration authorizing the OperatorApp with existing IAM session

idc.documentation: Configuration authorizing the OperatorApp with AWS Identity Center (IdC)

fieldList.documentation: A list of specific failures encountered while validating the input. A member can appear in this list more than once if it failed to satisfy multiple constraints.

ValidationException.documentation: A standard error for input validation failures. This should be thrown by services when a member of the input structure falls outside of the modeled or documented constraints.

path.documentation: A JSONPointer expression to the structure member whose value failed to satisfy the modeled constraints.

message.documentation: A detailed description of the validation failure.

ValidationExceptionField.documentation: Describes one specific validation failure for an input member.

ValidationStatus.documentation: Represents the validation state of an association.

Webhook.documentation: Represents a complete Webhook with all its properties, and unique identifier.

documentation: AWS DevOps Agent Control Plane Service provides APIs for managing AI-powered development operations, including agent spaces, service associations, and operator applications.
